Reviews.Title: Incredible Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Rajesh Pandey
Reviews.Content: Last evening I Bought this phone and since then I had tried myself to stop using it in office, but I can't. Whenever I found time in office, I used it.If I talk about exteriors, its beautifully crafted in design and aesthetic. Mine is in black color and sliding keypad is in light red color. You'll also get 2 more battery cover inside the pack.Now its time to discuss about some of the cool features of this Phone.Touch-screen: Though its a capacitive touch screen, it has one of the best touch response. Like all touch screen phones, it will vibrate whenever touch screen is used. You can also increase or decrease the intensity of vibration in phone tools.Display: One of the best among its categories of phones. Brightness can also be adjusted per user wish.Keypad: One of the coolest and best feature of this phone is sliding keypad which can be used for chatting, messaging and for browsing internet. Many times when I am not comfortable to use the touch panel, I am using keypad.Sliding the keypad out will also make the screen to be turn over towards the keypad.Sound and Music: Though I haven't used this feature, I heard the ringing tone was loud enough for me to hear the tone from inside the room.Wi-fi: This one really worked faster than I expected, probably coz I have best wi-fi installed in my home. The speed can vary from time to time.Google Maps: I never thought this phone would come with pre-installed google maps. When I opened it, the active GPS located my exact position in maps which I thought would be possible only in PC's.You'll get one battery charger, one headset jack, 2 software CDs, 1 data cable, phone manual, 2 additional battery cover inside the package.I will only say one thing- This phone is a value for money.....

Reviews.Title: I LOVE THIS PHONE
Reviews.Author: Shalabi04
Reviews.Content: this phone is AWESOME as you can read the description on the title of the phone "Samsung B5310 CorbyPRO Quad-Band GSM Unlocked Cell Phone with Touch Screen, Full QWERTY keyboard, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth - International Version with No Warranty (Black/Red)"i know that alot of people are huge iphones but i think this phone is better. its a touch screen plus it gots a Full QWERTY keyboardthere are only 3 cons about this product, none nothing really major1: figuring how to use the internet through WiFi is a pain, i still have not been able to figure it out how to do it2: as the title of this phone also describes, this phone does not come with warranty, now you can buy one with warranty but as you know the price of the phone will be a bit higher3: since this phone is not a windows mobile phone it would be a real big pain in the rear to back up your contacts appointments and filesbut besides all of this none of these really concerns me from how much i love this phone

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Alessandro N. Mattos
Reviews.Content: A good phone. Nothing to complain about it. The keyboard is very good, and the interface is nice. The operating system cannot be customized (i.e. install apps and so on).

Reviews.Title: Good, but can be better
Reviews.Author: Buyer "Buyer"
Reviews.Content: The phone works ok. However, it arrived with a charger that would not work in the US. I called the seller, they mailed me a charger which was not brand new and was not Samsung. The charger works, however, when the phone is being charged I can't use it. I have to unplug it. The user manual was not brand new, it was clear that it had been previously used.Pros- great sound-clear picture-large screen-wi-fi capabilityCons:-touchscreen is not always responsive-Charger was not made for the US outlet

Reviews.Title: Great phone...no Spanish language available
Reviews.Author: cyhendrix
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my Godson living in Ecuador.  It worked perfectly, except for the fact that the Spanish language was not available for this phone.  It had English and Chinese.  My Godson was very disappointed because he was unable to use the phone due to the language issues.  The only thing I suggest that needs to be added/changed for this phone is for the Spanish language to be available.  This is a global phone, he was able to purchase a Sim card from Movistar.  The phone worked great on the network.

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: Merilin Meite "merkaaa"
Reviews.Content: I bought it in March... it works, everything is ok, they send me the right phone so im happy with it BUT it says its 3G but idk if im stupid but i cant figure how to use it or how it works or maybe it just don't work. Wifi works and i came back to my country and it work perfectly fine here too with my Estonian phone card.

Reviews.Title: Sent me wrong phone
Reviews.Author: debbieg1
Reviews.Content: I ordered a Samsung Corbypro B5310 and received a Samsung Candy B5310.  Basically the same phone, same model number, but the Candy was only released in Taiwan.  Guess what language the phone I just received today as a Christmas gift for my 11 year old grandson is in??..  I can find no way to make it English, have no contact number for the company that sold it to me through Amazon - OEM, and I now have no gift for my grandson.  Cost me $187.00  and I don't know whether to laugh or cry.  It does say "International", but since when is one language international. I have e-mailed them tonight, and if they make this right I will re-post.  It is now December 13th, and I'm wondering how this will be fixed by Christmas.  OEM for Cheap is the name of the company...

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Massala
Reviews.Content: Please do not waste your money on this POS. Wi-fi does not work, most of the apps does not work here in the states.

Reviews.Title: Horrible.  Simply Horrible.
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: If you already like this type of phone then this may not be a big issue to you.  My complaints are:1. Always remember to lock this phone.  Otherwise you will be "face dialing" the person you are talking to, beeping constantly in their ear.  Another side effect is you almost always accidentally put them on speaker phone.2.  The software buttons may be depressed 10 or 11 times before they respond.3. Texting is a nightmare.4. I challenge any normal person who just wants to use a phone to dial using one hand.  It is horrible.I would imagine this is not particular to samsung, any similar design may have similar issues.  Little daily annoyances with this phone, nothing huge but they add up.  Wish I had my old razor back.

Reviews.Title: Not a Corby Pro (not formated for English Language)
Reviews.Author: Andrew G Hinson
Reviews.Content: Other reviewers are correct that seller listing as a Corby Pro is incorrect.  They shipped a Samsung Candy.  The phones are identical in appearance and features with the exception that the keys and the language on the phone are in Hindi, not english.  Samsung and the Seller are unable to provide any support for the phone.  Hence the langauge cannot be changed.  The Corby Pro is a phone that was sold in the UK and is an English language phone with correct keys.  Notice that the other reviewers rating this highly are Indian (so it is probably a great phone if you read Hindi)

Reviews.Title: Dont buy, if you are not Thai
Reviews.Author: Mamta G
Reviews.Content: So I bought this phone, I mean the corbyPro but they sent me Candy 3G, i dont know those are same model or not, they look a like. And also the language is different, I guess it is Thai, And there is no way you can change the setting. Please dont buy this phone if you are non thai language spoker, It sucks.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Quad-Band Phone GSM 850/900/1800/1900 with GPRS and EDGE capabilities
Touch Screen and QWERTY Slider; Bluetooth; Wi-Fi; Document Viewer; FM Radio; Music Player and Video recording.
GSM&EDGE; Band; 3MP Camera with 4x Digital / Optical Zoom; Micro SD Card Slot; SMS; MMS; E-mail and IM.
Talk time Up to 8 hs, Stand-by time Up to 560 hs.
